Company Description:

GEDORE is a family-owned company that has been manufacturing high-quality tools since 1919. Based in Remscheid, Germany, GEDORE is one of the world's leading partners for premium tools. Our GEDORE quality promise, self-image, and entrepreneurial spirit are the recipe for success that has turned the tiny German forge into a family company with an international range.

Role Description

This is a full-time Sales Manager role. The Sales Manager will be responsible for market planning, account management, sales, customer service, and sales management. The Sales Manager will also be responsible for developing and implementing sales strategies to drive revenue growth and expand the customer base.

Qualifications

Market Planning and Account Management skills

Sales and Sales Management skills

Excellent customer service and interpersonal skills

Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets

Ability to develop and implement sales strategies that drive revenue growth

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

Experience in premium hand tool distribution

Manage Sales with designated accounts focused on high quality, precision torque tools offering solutions and developing growth opportunities.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $75,000.00 per year

Benefits:
• Health insurance

Compensation package:
• Commission pay
• Monthly bonus

Schedule:
• Monday to Friday

Travel requirement:
• Travel
• Up to 50% travel

Application Question(s):
• Do you have documented experience selling tools, specifically torque tools?

Work Location: Remote
